name: BrookfieldVoice
0:
”Alexa open Brookfield”
”Alexa ask Brookfield what is the price of this model home”
”Alexa ask Brookfield what are the taxes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brook field
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Brookfield Voice Skill allows home shoppers that schedule a self-guided home tour to ask Alexa questions during their visit to learn more about the home, the community, and the builder. They can even use Alexa to make a call to the community salesperson. For access, speak with your Brookfield Residential Sales Representative to register an account and to complete your registration of the Brookfield Residential Voice Skill. This skill requires account linking.
